job_tasks.phrase: Take responsibility for the end-to-end lifecycle of applications-from PoC to production.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes managing the entire software development lifecycle, from initial concept to deployment, which is a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the maintenance and evolution of the tech stack and frameworks
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining and evolving technology stacks and frameworks is a fundamental software development activity aimed at ensuring the longevity and efficiency of applications.

job_tasks.phrase: support new features and architecture improvements to ensure scalability and reliability.
job_tasks.justification: Adding new features and improving architecture for scalability and reliability are key responsibilities within software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with core teams to ensure high-quality, reusable components
job_tasks.justification: This phrase implies understanding the needs of core teams and contributing to building shared components, which requires understanding business requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: provide best practices, and help make data scientists and business users autonomous in building solutions end-to-end.
job_tasks.justification: Providing best practices and enabling others to build solutions end-to-end directly relates to understanding business needs and facilitating their achievement through technical guidance.
This phrase implies involvement in taking concepts from the proof-of-concept stage to a production environment, which includes operational aspects of deployment and maintenance.
Ensuring scalability and reliability are critical aspects of operations engineering for production systems.

soft_skills.phrase: take responsibility for the end-to-end lifecycle of applications
Take responsibility for the end-to-end lifecycle of applications
help make data scientists and business users autonomous
Bring your expertise and enthusiasm to help grow a collaborative, inclusive, and innovative team culture.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on general software development lifecycle management, collaboration, and team growth. It lacks specific mentions of AI technologies, models, or generative tasks that would align it with a GenAI Engineer or ML Engineer profile. Therefore, it leans towards a general software engineering or team lead role.
